About Us

Wealthwave Consulting

Wealthwave Consulting is an independent advisory firm that helps investors and businesses succeed in Libya and Tunisia. We specialise in market research, financial modeling, valuation, and investment support.

Our clients are international investors, project developers, and local businesses who seek clarity, structure, and reliable insight in complex markets. Backed by strong local knowledge and real connections on the ground, we turn ideas into well-planned, investment-ready opportunities.

Our Mission

Our mission is to bridge the gap between capital and opportunity in Libya and Tunisia. We support investors with the insight, financial logic, and local understanding they need to make informed decisions, structure viable projects, and create long-term value.
